root.name: Black Knight 2000
root.description: OverviewBlack Knight 2000 is the sequel to the original Black Knight pinball machine that was notable for being one of the magna-save system, this was abandoned for Black Knight 2000 which reverted to a fixed game. Black Knight 2000 is perhaps most known for it's awesome theme song and tasty guitar rifts. The designer of the game Steve Ritchie, and industry veterans Dan Forden and Brian Schmidt all worked on the theme music for the game together, vocals were provided by Stephanie Rogers. Black Knight 2000 was the last pinball machine that Ed Boon ever worked on. The slogan for the game was "He rides again".
